title: LEGO Harry Potter: Years 5-7
description: Based on the last three Harry Potter books and final four films, LEGO Harry Potter: Years 5-7 takes players through Harry Potter’s heroic adventures in the Muggle and wizarding worlds. From Privet Drive in Little Whinging to Diagon Alley, Hogsmeade and Hogwarts, players will encounter new faces, new challenges and new magic, preparing them for the ultimate face-off against Lord Voldemort! Lego Harry Potter: Years 1-4

system_requirements.OS *: Windows XP SP3 Vista or Windows 7
system_requirements.Processor: Dual Core CPU @ 2GHz (Pentium D or better)
system_requirements.Video Card: Shader Model 3 graphics card (NVIDIA GeForce 6800, 7800, 8xxx or better; ATI X1950 or better)
